snippet: The lower house of Mexico’s Congress has approved a tax on soda and other sugary drinks as part of the government’s fight against the twin epidemics of obesity and diabetes.
abstract: Lower house of Mexico’s Congress approves tax on soda and other sugary drinks as part of government’s fight against twin epidemics of obesity and diabetes.
lead_paragraph: The lower house of Mexico’s Congress has approved a tax on soda and other sugary drinks as part of the government’s fight against the twin epidemics of obesity and diabetes.
